turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi! how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a Starbucks order for pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. What drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking for a grande caramel macchiato please with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. You want a grande caramel macchiato with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order for you right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and to confirm, this is the starbucks on california street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, actually I currently need that order to be picked up at the Starbucks at 615 South Military Avenue in Green Bay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks on 615 south military avenue in greenbay. Got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me change that in your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you'd like a grande caramel macchiato with whole milk sent to the starbucks on 615 south military avenue in greenbay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is perfectly correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you quite kindly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have a good day.
